1.content: You were watching TV in your room on some quiet Sunday evening, watching some dumb shows spending time... You were quite bored and had a sudden feeling of tiredness. You had your hand holding your head on your desk, in front of your PC screen... You were slowly going into darkness.. That was it... You blacked out and then you woke up. You didn't open your eyes yet, still scratching your back with one hand and your cheek with the other. Then you thought what the fuck I must have gone asleep on my desk. Suddenly you realized it wasn't quite possible... You were lying on something soft definetly not your room ground ! You opened your eyes to see where you were... And you couldn't believe your eyes ! After a few moments of hesitating you realized looking at the huge furniture around you that you had actually shrunk! You couldn't tell to what size you shrunk since you had no real perspective and you didn't recognize the place you were in. Weird. You decided to go for the closest chair near you so you could atleast measure yourself approximately...
1.title: How it all begins !

114.content:
You couldn't believe your eyes when you saw THAT handbag. You recognized it straight away. It was your crush Amelie's bag for sure! You had never seen this student room of course for you've never been able to really talk to her... No that was out of reality. A few moments ago you were still laffin in front of your TV screen and now you're here, shrunk. "I must have fell asleep and I'm dreamin... right ?"

Whatever. You started walking towards one random direction not really knowing what to do. You realized this room wasn't that big... Well... way of talking. From a normal person's perspective you could tell this room wasnt quite big. It looked like a student room. There was a bed far above on your left, a small desk with a computer on it and some papers, a few chairs and a sofa with a small tv and a table in front of it, there was a wardrobe with a lot of shoes on the bottom of it... Pretty much the same kind of room as you have. The ground was in soft carpet.

You decided to explore a little bit and perhaps get help... You head for

choices: Spend three hours inside of my socks!
145.content:
After looking around the room a bit, you realize with dread that it is in fact the room of Tracy.
If she finds you at this size...
You shudder.
The things she used to do to you...
You shake your head and notice that you seem to be on the hard wooden floor of the room. Good. At least there's no obstacles to overcome to get out of this place.
Suddenly, you pause.
Is that...
Footsteps?
Your eyes widen.
No matter what, nobody can find you like this.
NOBODY.

You break into a run to try and get under a nearby dresser, but the door swings open, and you see Tracy standing in the doorway. She's wearing blue jeans, white ankle socks and a black T-shirt.
Tracy quickly spots you and in a flash, slams a socked foot down in front of you.
Sorry, make that a dirty socked foot. It seems that Tracy just got back from the gym, and her socks are pretty sweaty and smelly.
You bump into her foot and fall on your rear.
Tracy quickly picks you up and holds you at eye level. She grins evily.
"Well well well...What do I have here? Could this possibly be Richard? I thought you were soooooo much taller..."
She speaks in a taunting tone, and you glare back at her. She squeezes you a bit tighter.
"Awwww...You know Richard, you can't be all mean to me like normal! If you misbehave, I might have to get a bit angry..."
You pale.
"Tracy...Look, you have to help me! I just shru-"
She laughs.
"Ha! Help you? Richard, I've been waiting YEARS for this kind of thing. You actually think I'm going to help you?"
You pale even more.
"W-what do you mean?"
Tracy grins even eviler.
"I mean, little man, starting from this point on you are hereby my little pet. The first thing I want you to do is..."
145.title: Caught!

choices: Pull off my sock with your teeth! Then kiss my feet
Pull off my sock with your teeth! Then lick my feet
1453.title: Reader's choice

info.brief_description: What happens when you shrunk near girls you know ?
info.description:
This story is my first one so I'd like it to be more based on what I like most... So I'll make a few simple rules and give you the first indications about the characters and the situation they're in :


RULES:


* No male interaction whatsoever unless it doesnt really interact with yourself.
* No vore, no anal stuff, no vagina... Only legs, mouth, feet, breast, asscheeks.
* Keep the main character unnoticed for a while (or forever if you like.) and he doesn't really like everything that happens to him and tries to get help eventually...
* The main character can't die being crushed due to the condensation of his body but he can drown or whatever. He hardly gets any wounded but he isnt invincible.

STORY


Richard is a 20 years old student and he has a secret crush for a 19 years old student which he never really had the balls to go talk to. That girl is named Amelie, she's a hot tiny blonde. She's very small and always smiling. She probably knows Richard for seeing him a few times in the same places. She has a boyfriend named David and he's 20 too. A lot of people recognize her because she wouldn't go unnoticed despite her small height and she's very popular.


Richard lives close to her aunt's house and he has 2 cousins. Charlene is age 20 like him and the other one is Tracy (18 yo).
Tracy is very popular at her college and she loves it. She loves acting like a brat and is a typical sexy blonde. She likes to annoy Richard and wouldn't mind having him as her new pet...
Charlene has brown hair and is a bit more down to earth then her sister, still very beautiful and friendly.

Richard's aunt Cathy is very beautiful and mature 41 yo woman who loves Richard.


You can add new characters to the story and Richard can get to other places.
